descriptionHtml:
This is my version of valkyria. THIS IS THE ORIGINAL VERSION!!!!!!
-->>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12946

I am talking I am talking everybody listen to me talk! i am talking i am talking everybody listen to me talk!

ATTENTION!!!

You will need -->>The Ashen Beauty - Valkyria Dragonborne -Tifa like char  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12946 This is required this have to be installed first!!! If you want that one installed read the requirements in the description of here/his mod

Requirements to let it look like mine:

FavoredSouls Angels in Skyrim : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10658
Angelic Halos and Demonic Horns : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11005
KURESE Gloria armor conversion for UNP  : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12595
R18Pn 02 - Leere Armor for UNP and CBBE V3  : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11756
ApachiiSkyHair : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 (Also in the The ashen version of valkyria but i linked it just if anyone wanted the hair seperretly!!!)
author: Xcleaver
